original_text: And Baasha slept with his fathers and was buried at Tirzah, and Elah his son reigned in his place.
korean_text: 바아사가 그의 조상들과 함께 자매 디르사에 장사되고 그의 아들 엘라가 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: And Baasha slept with his fathers
and Elah his son reigned in his place.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 엘라가 그를 대신하여 왕이 되니라
